# Portfolio Website - Roman Ahmad

This is a modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Vite.

## Project Stack
- React 18
- Vite
- Tailwind CSS
- JavaScript (ES6+)

## Code Style
- Use functional components with hooks
- Follow React best practices
- Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling
- Maintain clean, readable code with proper commenting

## Component Structure
- Each major section is a separate component
- Components are located in `src/components/`
- Main App component orchestrates all sections
- Use semantic HTML and accessibility features
